# gxg-scroll

You can achieve the scroll in two ways: By using the <code>gxg-component</code>, or by using a <em>mixin</em>.

<ul>
<li><strong>By using the component:</strong> Wrap the content inside a <code>gxg-scroll</code> and set a <code>max-height</code> value to it.</li>
<li><strong>By using the mixin:</strong> Apply the mixin to the element that contains the text, and then wrap the text inside a div with the class "scroll-container".</li>
</ul>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type     | Default  |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | -------- | -------- |
| `maxHeight` | `max-height` | Max height  | `string` | `"100%"` |
